itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 12-13 / JSH 1:66-75 : Dr. Scott Esplin : Part I
title: Doctrine & Covenants 12-13 / JSH 1:66-75 : Dr. Scott Esplin : Part I
description: What do you do with the sections of the Doctrine and Covenants that repeat themselves? What do you do with the sections . . . . okay, you get it. Dr. Scott Esplin joins us and helps us understand the specific circumstances that surround the Knights, the Smiths, the Whitmers, and the Stoals (aka Stowells) and their desires for callings and personal revelation. Learn how we can also build the Kingdom of God--even if we don’t currently have a calling.

itunes:author: Hank Smith & John Bytheway
